creator: Lowcal Apps
descriptionHtml:
Personalized diet plans, workout plans, access to nutritionists, food tracker, and activity diary all in one place. We provide you with your very own body composition analyzer and smart bracelet to live healthier and happier with Lowcal!

If you want to start a Keto, Paleo, Vegan, Vegetarian, Lacto-Ovo, or even Atkins diet or if you are concerned about your food allergies and intolerances, we will put the expertise of Lowcal nutrition and fitness specialists in the palm of your hand.

Lowcal app is designed to intelligently discover which plan (diet, nutrition, and fitness) best suits your schedule and lifestyle. Whether you want to lose weight, eat healthy, or gain weight, we have the right diet and workout plans for you and your goals. Here is what Lowcal offers you:

• Personalized diet plans & delicious recipes
• Personalized fat burning workout plans
• Tracking of calories and macros
• Integrates with devices and gadgets
• Speak with your personalized nutritionist
• Bilingual apps and staff (English & Arabic)

The app helps you to maintain food and activity diary of all sorts of activities; food, sleep, medication, workouts, steps, feelings, insulin and many more with one key objective; Help you live healthier and happier.

Download Lowcal app and enjoy a plethora of free diets and workouts. No fitness equipment is required, so all you need is your dedication and resolve, and by sending you our body composition analyzer and smart bracelet that are designed specifically to sync and save your readings and measurements on the app, our nutrition and fitness experts will accompany you on every step you take towards a healthier and more fit you. They will go hand in hand with you in your journey.

You can read more about us here:

• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/lowcalapps
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/lowcalapps
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/LowcalApps
• LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/lowcalapp
• Privacy Policy: https://www.lowcaltech.com/en/PrivacyPolicy
• Terms of Service: https://www.lowcaltech.com/en/TermsOfService

Download the app now and let’s work together :)
descriptionShort: Personalized diet plans, workout plans, food tracker, and activity diary

appDetails.developerAddress:
Office 118, Building 01,
Dubai Internet City,
Dubai, United Arab Emirates
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
A new release and new features. In this release, we focused on:

- We renovated the Macro Tracker for both free and premium versions of the app
- A new approach for push notifications to make your journey more enjoyable
- Minor bug fixing which you wouldn't have noticed, but we did on your behalf :)

Have any questions or feedback? Feel free to reach out to feedback@lowcaltech.com

Enjoy it!
Lowcal Family

title: Lowcal: Diet & Workout Planner

container.value:
Office 118, Building 01,
Dubai Internet City,
Dubai, United Arab Emirates

creator: Lowcal Apps
descriptionHtml:
Personalized diet & meal plans, workout plans, licensed nutritionists, food tracker, and activity diary all in one app. Start a healthier and happier life with Lowcal App!

Whether you want to lose weight, tone up, get healthy, change your habits, or start a new diet, you can download Lowcal App and use the free content for as long as you want. If you decide to go premium, our packages start from $7 per month.

Fast and easy food tracking

1. Vast Food Database: that contains tens of thousands foods and meals in our database
2. Food Insights: which will help you make healthier choices about the food you eat
3. Calorie Counter: that calculates calories in your foods, meals and recipes automatically
4. Nutrients Tracking: Calories, fat, protein, carbs, and more can be tracked automatically
5. Personalized Diary: Log breakfast, lunch, dinner and snacks or create your own meals
6. Water Tracking: Log water in cups and the app will automatically evaluate your performance

Reach your goals

1. Choose a Program: Lowcal App supports weight loss, fat burning, weight gain, bodybuilding and healthy eating goals
2. Set a Goal: Either you create your own or let us create personalized goals for you
3. Change Habits: We will put the expertise of Lowcal App’s specialists in the palm of your hand.

Log your activities

1. Choose From 250+ Exercises: Our workout plans and exercises help your body burn faster and better
2. Track Activity: Log your exercise, workout, medication, body analysis, and body measurements
3. Track Steps: Set a daily step goal and see a graph of your step daily performance

Get the motivation you need

1. Invite Friends: Connect with the friends that can give you the support you need
2. Join Our Community: Find motivation, support, tips, and advice in our active groups

Make sure you celebrate success

1. Track Progress: Stay motivated with a simple chart that shows how you’re improving over time
2. Progress Photos: Keep photos to the new you to see and celebrate your progress
3. Share Your Progress: Help inspire friends and family members on their own health journey

With Lowcal free account or free user, you will have:

1. A Classic Diet which will help you kick start a healthier lifestyle
2. Access to the food library with detailed nutritional information
3. Easy tracking of macros (carbs, proteins, and fats) and water
4. Calorie counting to keep you aware of your daily intake
5. Get a daily rating based on your daily intake and food quality
6. Track your weight and body measurements
7. Track your daily habits; water, sports, steps, medication, and more
8. If you speak English or Arabic, then the app speaks your language

For extended features, join Lowcal Premium and get:

1. Wide variety of Diet that include; Ketogenic, Atkins, Paleo, Intermittent Fasting, Vegan, Vegetarian, Balanced, etc.
2. Short Meal Plans that include; Rapid Weight Loss, Sugar Detox, Body Cleansing, DASH Plan, etc.
3. Access to our vast recipe library in addition to recipe suggestions for your daily meals
4. Supporting Workout Plans which help your body burn faster and better. All exercises are doable at home and require no equipment
5. Body measurement tracking to ensure the effectiveness of the Diet or Meal Plan
6. Lowcal Smart Body Analyzer which measures, Weight, BMI, Fat, Visceral Fat, Subcutaneous Fat, Muscle Mass, and many more

Lowcal Premium Subscription Packages can be 3, 6, or 12 months. subscriptions do not renew automatically. Instead of renewal, you will have to buy a new subscription package.

You can read more about us here:

• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/lowcalapps
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/lowcalapps
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/LowcalApps
• LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/lowcalapps
• Privacy Policy: https://www.lowcalapps.com/en/PrivacyPolicy
• Terms of Service: https://www.lowcalapps.com/en/TermsOfService

Download the app now and let’s work together :)

- A catalogue of the workout plans that will help you meet your goal
- Minor bug fixes which will make your journey way smoother :)

title: Lowcal: Diet Planner, Food Diary, Activity Tracker

container.value:
Office 118, Building 01,
Dubai Internet City,
Dubai, United Arab Emirates

creator: Lowcal Apps
descriptionHtml:
Personalized diet & meal plans, workout plans, licensed nutritionists, food tracker, and activity diary all in Lowcal app!

Lowcal App is a simple and comprehensive diet and workout planner. It brings valuable nutrition insights in just one tap, as well as makes it quick and easy to track everything that matters most in a weight loss journey. Our Premium Subscriptions start from $7 per month.

Fast and easy food tracking

1. Vast Food Database that contains thousands of foods and meals
2. Food Insights which will help in making healthier food choices
3. Calorie Counter that calculates calories in foods, meals and recipes automatically
4. Nutrients Tracking makes it easier to track fat, protein, and carbs intake automatically
5. Personalized Diary that keeps track of logged breakfast, lunch, dinner, snacks and other meals too
6. Water Tracking can be challenging, so our tracker helps making it easier and faster

Goal Setting

1. Program: We support programs that include; lose weight, build muscle, eat healthy, and more
2. Goal: Lowcal app helps creating the suitable personalized goal for each body type
3. Habits: With the support of Lowcal Nutritionists, habits can be improved dramatically

Activity Tracking

1. Over 250 fat burning workout plans and exercises are demonstrated in videos
2. The app can keep track of exercises, feelings, body analysis, and body measurements
3. Steps are just another important performance indicator that should be tracked

Get the motivation you need

1. Lowcal Community gives all the motivation, support, tips, and advice
2. Our Nutritionists who give all insights and support that are needed

Lowcal free account gives:

1. A Classic Diet which is a good starting point towards a healthier lifestyle
2. Access to food library which contains detailed nutritional information
3. Easy tracking of macros (carbs, proteins, and fats) and water
4. Calorie counting to increase awareness of daily calorie intake
5. Daily rating based on daily food intake (calories and macros)
6. Easier body weight and measurements tracking
7. Tracking of daily habits; water, sports, steps, and more
8. English and Arabic app interfaces

For extended features, Lowcal Premium provides:

1. Wide variety of Diets; Ketogenic, Atkins, Paleo, Intermittent Fasting, Vegan, Vegetarian, Balanced, etc.
2. Short Meal Plans that include; Rapid Weight Loss, Sugar Detox, Body Cleansing, DASH Plan, etc.
3. Access to our vast recipe library in addition to recipe suggestions for assigned daily meals
4. Workout Plans that improve metabolism, all doable at home and require no equipment
5. Smart Body Analyzer which measures BMI, Fat, Visceral Fat, Subcutaneous Fat, Muscle Mass, and more

Lowcal Premium Subscription Packages can be 3, 6, or 12 months. Subscriptions do not renew automatically. Instead of auto-renewal, users will have to buy a new subscription package.

For more details, please visit:

• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/lowcalapps
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/lowcalapps
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/LowcalApps
• LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/lowcalapps
• Privacy Policy: https://www.lowcalapps.com/en/PrivacyPolicy
• Terms of Service: https://www.lowcalapps.com/en/TermsOfService
descriptionShort: Personalized diet & meal plans, workout plans, food tracker, and activity diary

appDetails.developerAddress:
Office 118, Building 01,
Dubai Internet City,
Dubai, United Arab Emirates
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We've got a whole set of new features for you in this release:

- Auto-track your progress by connecting Google Fit
- Food/Meal Rating which gives you insights about your food
- Track food intake using our barcode scanner and calorie insert
- Track exercise by inserting calories or using exercise gallery
- And a totally new look and feel that you will fall in love with :)

Have any questions or feedback? Get it touch on feedback@lowcaltech.com

Enjoy it!
Lowcal Family

7. Tracking of daily habits; water, sports, steps, and more
8. English and Arabic app interfaces

For extended features, Lowcal Premium provides:

1. Wide variety of Diets; Ketogenic, Atkins, Paleo, Intermittent Fasting, Vegan, Vegetarian, Balanced, etc.
2. Short Meal Plans that include; Rapid Weight Loss, Sugar Detox, Body Cleansing, DASH Plan, etc.
3. Access to our vast recipe library in addition to recipe suggestions for assigned daily meals
4. Workout Plans that improve metabolism, all doable at home and require no equipment
5. Smart Body Analyzer which measures BMI, Fat, Visceral Fat, Subcutaneous Fat, Muscle Mass, and more

Lowcal Premium Subscription Packages can be 3, 6, or 12 months. Subscriptions do not renew automatically. Instead of auto-renewal, users will have to buy a new subscription package.

For more details, please visit:

• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/lowcalapps
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/lowcalapps
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/LowcalApps
• LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/lowcalapps
• Privacy Policy: https://www.lowcalapps.com/en/PrivacyPolicy
• Terms of Service: https://www.lowcalapps.com/en/TermsOfService

creator: Lowcal Apps
descriptionHtml:
Personalized diet & meal plans, workout plans, licensed nutritionists, food tracker, and activity diary all in Lowcal app!

Lowcal App is a simple and comprehensive diet and workout planner. It brings valuable nutrition insights in just one tap, as well as makes it quick and easy to track everything that matters most in a weight loss journey. Our Premium Subscriptions start from $7 per month.

Fast and easy food tracking

1. Vast Food Database that contains thousands of foods and meals
2. Food Insights which will help in making healthier food choices
3. Calorie Counter that calculates calories in foods, meals and recipes automatically
4. Nutrients Tracking makes it easier to track fat, protein, and carbs intake automatically
5. Personalized Diary that keeps track of logged breakfast, lunch, dinner, snacks and other meals too
6. Water Tracking can be challenging, so our tracker helps making it easier and faster

Goal Setting

1. Program: We support programs that include; lose weight, build muscle, eat healthy, and more
2. Goal: Lowcal app helps creating the suitable personalized goal for each body type
3. Habits: With the support of Lowcal Nutritionists, habits can be improved dramatically

Activity Tracking

1. Over 250 fat burning workout plans and exercises are demonstrated in videos
2. The app can keep track of exercises, feelings, body analysis, and body measurements
3. Steps are just another important performance indicator that should be tracked

Get the motivation you need

1. Lowcal Community gives all the motivation, support, tips, and advice
2. Our Nutritionists who give all insights and support that are needed

Lowcal free account gives:

1. A Classic Diet which is a good starting point towards a healthier lifestyle
2. Access to food library which contains detailed nutritional information
3. Easy tracking of macros (carbs, proteins, and fats) and water
4. Calorie counting to increase awareness of daily calorie intake
5. Daily rating based on daily food intake (calories and macros)
6. Easier body weight and measurements tracking
7. Tracking of daily habits; water, sports, steps, and more
8. English and Arabic app interfaces

For extended features, Lowcal Premium provides:

1. Wide variety of Diets; Ketogenic, Atkins, Paleo, Intermittent Fasting, Vegan, Vegetarian, Balanced, etc.
2. Short Meal Plans that include; Rapid Weight Loss, Sugar Detox, Body Cleansing, DASH Plan, etc.
3. Access to our vast recipe library in addition to recipe suggestions for assigned daily meals
4. Workout Plans that improve metabolism, all doable at home and require no equipment
5. Smart Body Analyzer which measures BMI, Fat, Visceral Fat, Subcutaneous Fat, Muscle Mass, and more

Lowcal Premium Subscription Packages can be 3, 6, or 12 months. Subscriptions do not renew automatically. Instead of auto-renewal, users will have to buy a new subscription package.

For more details, please visit:

• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/lowcalapps
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/lowcalapps
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/LowcalApps
• LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/lowcalapps
• Privacy Policy: https://www.lowcalapps.com/en/PrivacyPolicy
• Terms of Service: https://www.lowcalapps.com/en/TermsOfService
